content: knitted hat/balaclava for men in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked top down with stocking stitch and ribbed edging pattern no me-228 yarn group b **sizes** s/m - l fits head size approx 57/59 - 60 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 200-200 g colour 06 brown **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm or 60 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm or 60 cm for rib
